data.prayer: Father, answer the requests of your people in the state of Ceará.
data.verse: This is the boldness which we have toward him, that, if we ask anything according to his will, he listens to us.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Ceará, Brazil
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, help the 2,106,889 believers in Ceará to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church of Ceará, Brazil that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Ceará to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Paiaku people might believe through him.
Father, encourage your church in Ceará that you never forsake them.
data.verse: Those who know your name will put their trust in you, for you, Yahweh, have not forsaken those who seek you.

data.prayer: Father, for those with enemies and who are afraid in Ceará, call them into your shelter and safety today.
data.verse: For you have been a refuge for me, a strong tower from the enemy.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the state of Ceará to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

location.name: Ceará
location.cities_list: Fortaleza, Caucaia, Juazeiro do Norte, Maracanaú, Sobral
location.cities_list_w_pop: Fortaleza (2,400,000), Caucaia (275,019), Juazeiro do Norte (225,230), Maracanaú (193,529), Sobral (157,996)
